description:
As a blood bank user
  I want to search for compatible donors using a patient's MRID
  So that I can find suitable donors for my patients

elements.name: Successfully find donors using valid patient MRID

steps.name: I am logged in as a blood bank user
I am on the blood bank dashboard
a patient with MRID "402" exists with blood group "A+"
donors with blood group "A+" are available
I enter MRID "402" in the donor search field
I click the search button
I should see donor results
the patient information should be displayed
